backend/main.mo: Main backend actor handling access control, user profiles, and post creation with visibility rules using storage and Stripe integrations.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old actor state to new format by adding an empty subscriptions map.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature requirements to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all major frontend files describing their purpose and functionality.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styles defining color variables for light/dark themes and base styling rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with metadata, PWA configuration, icons, and root element mounting the React app.
frontend/public/.ic-assets.json5: IC asset configuration defining caching rules and MIME types for static files.
frontend/public/404.html: Redirect page storing the original path in sessionStorage before routing back to the SPA entry point.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app metadata, colors, icons, and startup behavior.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing precaching, runtime caching, and offline fallback behavior for the app.
frontend/PUBLISHING.md: Guide describing prerequisites and steps for deploying the frontend app to the Internet Computer.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the root app with theme, router, and routes for feed, post detail, new post, and pricing, including redirect-handling on load.
Shows the logged-in user's name or abbreviated principal if authenticated.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity authentication with loading states and error recovery.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Top navigation bar with logo, pricing link, PWA install button, auth status, and login/logout.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Page layout wrapper adding header, footer, offline notice, and profile setup modal around main content.
frontend/src/components/posts/ImageCropp: Interactive image cropper allowing drag-to-adjust crop area and producing a cropped blob.
frontend/src/components/posts/ImageZoomV: Modal viewer with zoom, pan, and reset controls for inspecting images.
frontend/src/components/posts/PostCard.t: Displays a writing post preview with image, metadata, and navigation to the post's detail page.
frontend/src/components/posts/PostVisibi: Renders a badge for private or link-only post visibility.
frontend/src/components/posts/WritingTyp: Shows a badge indicating whether a post is poetry or prose.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Prompts new authenticated users without a profile to enter and save their name.
frontend/src/components/pwa/InstallAppBu: Provides a PWA install button that triggers the install prompt or shows fallback instructions when unavailable.
frontend/src/components/pwa/OfflineNotic: Shows a fixed offline alert when the browser loses network connectivity.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, logout, and identity restoration.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for posts, user profiles, subscriptions, and Stripe checkout actions using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styling including theme variables, typography, textures, and layout utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/imageCrop.ts: Utility to crop an image file using canvas and return the cropped result as a Blob.
frontend/src/lib/imageUpload.ts: Converts a file to an ExternalBlob with optional progress reporting.
frontend/src/lib/postPresentation.ts: Formats author principals and post timestamps into human-readable strings.
frontend/src/lib/seo.ts: Helpers for dynamically setting the document title and meta description.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider and renders the root component.
frontend/src/pages/FeedPage.tsx: Fetches and displays all posts in a grid with loading state, SEO setup, and navigation to create a new post.
frontend/src/pages/NewPostPage.tsx: Provides a form for creating a new post with image upload, cropping, validation, and submission via createPost.
frontend/src/pages/PostDetailPage.tsx: Loads and displays a single post with metadata, image zoom, error handling, and dynamic SEO updates.
frontend/src/pages/PricingPage.tsx: Renders subscription plans and handles Stripe checkout creation, return verification, and subscription state management.
frontend/src/pwa/registerServiceWorker.t: Registers the service worker, checks for updates, and logs status or errors.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for retrieving, clearing, and persisting URL parameters across both query and hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for the frontend UI.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s state metadata, a detailed summary of the app’s architecture and features, and a list of existing features with their IDs, descriptions, and versions.
